TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DispatchGroup extends CoreFoundation.DispatchObject

Docs.summary: Manages group of code blocks allows for aggregate synchronization.
Docs.remarks: Code block can be executed on different dispatch queues but managed as a group.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class CoreFoundation.DispatchGroup Create() cil managed
public void DispatchAsync (CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, Action action);
.method public hidebysig instance void DispatchAsync(class CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, class System.Action action) cil managed

Docs.param: The dispatch queue to which the block will be submitted for asynchronous invocation.
Docs.summary: Submits a block to a dispatch queue and associates the block with the given dispatch group.
Docs.remarks: Submits a block to a dispatch queue and associates the block with the given dispatch group. The dispatch group may be used to wait for the completion of the blocks it references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Enter() cil managed

Docs.summary: Explicitly sets that a code block is beeing managed by the group.
Docs.remarks: It can be used to manually manage dispatch group tasks by incrementing the current count of outstanding tasks in the group.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Leave() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases a code block association with the group.
Docs.remarks: It can be used to manually manage dispatch group tasks by decrementing the current count of outstanding tasks in the group.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Notify (CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, Action action);
.method public hidebysig instance void Notify(class CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, class System.Action action) cil managed

Docs.param: The dispatch queue to which the block will be submitted for asynchronous invocation.
The action to invoke when the group completes.
Docs.summary: Schedule a block to be submitted to a queue when all the blocks associated with a group have completed.

remarks.para: This function schedules a notification block to be submitted to the specified queue once all blocks associated with the dispatch group have completed.
If no blocks are associated with the dispatch group (i.e. the group is empty) then the notification block will be submitted immediately.
The group will be empty at the time the notification block is submitted to the target queue.Â

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Wait(valuetype CoreFoundation.DispatchTime timeout) cil managed

Docs.param: A DispatchTime that represents the number of nanoseconds to wait.
Docs.summary: Waits synchronously for all blocks in the group to complete or the specified timeout has elapsed.
Docs.returns: if all code blockes finished before timeout otherwise .

remarks.para: This function waits for the completion of the blocks associated with the given dispatch group, and returns after all blocks have completed or when the specified timeout has elapsed.
This function will return immediately if there are no blocks associated with the dispatch group (i.e. the group is empty).
The result of calling this function from multiple threads simultaneously with the same dispatch group is undefined.
After the successful return of this function, the dispatch group is empty.
